ygData.subject: GOOD BYE ALL
ygData.msgSnippet: I must now regretfully depart from the RPG.  I must say that is has been an honor and a privilage to role play with all of you. I shall miss you all very much.

Subject: GOOD BYE ALL

I must now regretfully depart from the RPG.  I must say that is has 
been an honor and a privilage to role play with all of you. I shall 
miss you all very much. Best wishes to all of you.  I hope that if I 
am able to return,  I shall have the honor of role playing with you 
all again. Thank you for letting me RPG here and for being such a 
wonderful group.  It's been a real pleasure to be apart of all this. 
Once again, I thank you all. Please feel free to email me on my 
private email when ever you wish.  I shall respond as soon as I can. 
Thank you.

Logo
